The notification channel used in Android 8.0 or higher to deliver foreground service sticky notifications. (more info here: https://developer.android.com/training/notify-user/channels) <--> SoP-Scapes
"Background location" "Indicates when the app is accessing your location in background"
The notification title and content that your user will see in the status bar while the service is running in foreground. (more info here: https://developer.android.com/guide/components/services#Foreground) <--> "SoP-Scapes app is using your location" ""
